WorkItem.ClosedComment: For this type of question, open a «Discussion» instead of an «Issue».
WorkItem.Description:
Hello, I have published 2 updates : Java 8u91 and Java 8u91 (64).

When I'm logged on a client as administrator the installation is OK
When I'm logged on a client as a simple user, I get a 6BA error code.

Help ... !

Thanks

Fip12
WorkItem.Summary: Java 8u91 only installs with admin rights
